content.content: 1. (1) An application for approval to expropriate land shall be in Form 1.  R.R.O. 1990, Reg. 363, s. 1 (1); O. Reg. 268/15, s. 2. (2) A notice of application for approval to expropriate land served and published by an expropriating authority under subsection 6 (1) of the Act shall be in Form 2.  R.R.O. 1990, Reg. 363, s. 1 (2); O. Reg. 268/15, s. 2. (3) A notice of a hearing served under subsection 7 (3) of the Act shall be in Form 3.  R.R.O. 1990, Reg. 363, s. 1 (3); O. Reg. 268/15, s. 2. (4) A notice indicating the grounds on which an expropriating authority intends to rely at a hearing and served by it under subsection 7 (4) of the Act shall be in Form 4.  R.R.O. 1990, Reg. 363, s. 1 (4); O. Reg. 268/15, s. 2. (5) A certificate of approval of the approving authority under subsection 8 (3) of the Act shall be in Form 5 or, if endorsed on a plan of the land intended for registration under section 9 of the Act, shall be in Form 6.  R.R.O. 1990, Reg. 363, s. 1 (5); O. Reg. 268/15, s. 2. (6) A notice of expropriation of land served by an expropriating authority under subsection 10 (1) of the Act shall be in Form 7 and the expropriating authority shall, with each such service, furnish the person so served with a notice of election in Form 8.  R.R.O. 1990, Reg. 363, s. 1 (6); O. Reg. 268/15, s. 2. (7) A notice of requirement of possession served by an expropriating authority under subsection 39 (1) of the Act shall be in Form 9.  R.R.O. 1990, Reg. 363, s. 1 (7); O. Reg. 268/15, s. 2. (8) A notice of abandonment of land under subsection 41 (1) of the Act shall be in Form 10.  R.R.O. 1990, Reg. 363, s. 1 (8); O. Reg. 268/15, s. 2. (9) A declaration of abandonment under subsection 41 (2) of the Act shall, (a)  where the abandoned land is registered under the Registry Act, be in Form 11; and (b)  where the abandoned land is registered under the Land Titles Act, be in Form 12.  R.R.O. 1990, Reg. 363, s. 1 (9); O. Reg. 268/15, s. 2.
content.raw_html:
1. (1) An application for approval to expropriate land shall be in Form 1.  R.R.O. 1990, Reg. 363, s. 1 (1); O. Reg. 268/15, s. 2.

(2) A notice of application for approval to expropriate land served and published by an expropriating authority under subsection 6 (1) of the Act shall be in Form 2.  R.R.O. 1990, Reg. 363, s. 1 (2); O. Reg. 268/15, s. 2.

(3) A notice of a hearing served under subsection 7 (3) of the Act shall be in Form 3.  R.R.O. 1990, Reg. 363, s. 1 (3); O. Reg. 268/15, s. 2.

(4) A notice indicating the grounds on which an expropriating authority intends to rely at a hearing and served by it under subsection 7 (4) of the Act shall be in Form 4.  R.R.O. 1990, Reg. 363, s. 1 (4); O. Reg. 268/15, s. 2.

(5) A certificate of approval of the approving authority under subsection 8 (3) of the Act shall be in Form 5 or, if endorsed on a plan of the land intended for registration under section 9 of the Act, shall be in Form 6.  R.R.O. 1990, Reg. 363, s. 1 (5); O. Reg. 268/15, s. 2.

(6) A notice of expropriation of land served by an expropriating authority under subsection 10 (1) of the Act shall be in Form 7 and the expropriating authority shall, with each such service, furnish the person so served with a notice of election in Form 8.  R.R.O. 1990, Reg. 363, s. 1 (6); O. Reg. 268/15, s. 2.

(7) A notice of requirement of possession served by an expropriating authority under subsection 39 (1) of the Act shall be in Form 9.  R.R.O. 1990, Reg. 363, s. 1 (7); O. Reg. 268/15, s. 2.

(8) A notice of abandonment of land under subsection 41 (1) of the Act shall be in Form 10.  R.R.O. 1990, Reg. 363, s. 1 (8); O. Reg. 268/15, s. 2.

(9) A declaration of abandonment under subsection 41 (2) of the Act shall,

(a)  where the abandoned land is registered under the Registry Act, be in Form 11; and

(b)  where the abandoned land is registered under the Land Titles Act, be in Form 12.  R.R.O. 1990, Reg. 363, s. 1 (9); O. Reg. 268/15, s. 2.

content.content:
2. In section 1, when a form is referred to by number, the reference is to the form with that number that is described in the Table of Forms at the end of this Regulation and that is available on the website of the Government of Ontario Central Forms Repository. O. Reg. 268/15, s. 3. Forms 1-12 Revoked:
